brand_identity.name: SchoolERP
brand_identity.visual_mood: Clean, Professional, Airy, Data-Rich but not Cluttered

rules: Never use Inter for Headings larger than 24px.
Use Manrope for all numbers and data displays.
Headings must be dark slate (slate-900), not pure black.

containers.card: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
containers.sidebar: bg-slate-900 text-slate-300 w-64 fixed h-full z-50

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.stat_card: relative overflow-hidden bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm group hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors
cards.feature_card: bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

navigation.sidebar_item: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 hover:bg-white/10 hover:text-white

glassmorphism.header: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50 sticky top-0 z-40

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Replace the existing colors in tailwind.config.js with the palette defined above. Ensure 'primary' is set to the new blue.
2. REFINE SIDEBAR: Update the sidebar styles in index.css to match the 'sidebar' container specs. Use the 'sidebar_item_active' class for the active state.
3. MODERNIZE CARDS: In DashboardPage.js (and others), replace standard card classes with the 'stat_card' definition. Remove heavy shadows, use borders.
4. TYPOGRAPHY: Apply 'font-heading' to all h1-h6 elements and 'font-body' to p, span, div. Ensure headings have tight tracking.
5. BENTO GRID: Refactor the main dashboard layout to use the 'dashboard_bento' grid strategy. Group related stats.
6. LOGIN PAGE: Update the login page to use the 'login_hero' image as a side banner or background.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) has a data-testid attribute (e.g., data-testid='login-submit-btn').
8. DO NOT BREAK FUNCTIONALITY: Keep all existing logic, routes, and contexts. Only change the visual presentation (JSX classes and CSS).
universal_guidelines: Input fields should have a subtle border (slate-200) and focus ring (primary/20).
Ensure high contrast for text (slate-600 for secondary text, slate-900 for primary).
